snippet: Federal prosecutors are again pursuing criminal charges against three top advisers to Ron Paul’s 2012 presidential campaign.
abstract: Federal prosecutors file grand jury indictment against Jesse Benton, John Tate and Dimtri Kesari, top advisers in Ron Paul's 2012 presidential campaign; indictment alleges men falsified campaign contribution reports among other violations.
lead_paragraph: Federal prosecutors are again pursuing criminal charges against three top advisers to Ron Paul’s 2012 presidential campaign.

headline.main: Iowa: Aides to Ron Paul Campaign Charged Again
headline.print_headline: Iowa: Aides to Ron Paul Campaign Charged Again
